```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
library(lubridate)
library(ggsurvfit)
library(gtsummary)
library(tidycmprsk)

#Step 1- Loading in the Data
CancerData <- read_csv("Data/CleanedData/RawData_clean.csv")
glimpse(CancerData)
CancerData


cox_os_unadjusted <- coxph(
  Surv(Survival_Months, OS_status) ~ Delay_Group,
  data = RawData_clean
)

# 4. Display Results
summary(cox_os_unadjusted)


#Now I want to create a Kaplan Meier Survival curve
OS_survival_object <- survfit(Surv(Time_to_Tx_Days, OS_Status) ~ Delay_Group, data = RawData_clean)
plot(OS_survival_object, lty = 2:3)
title("Kaplan-Meier Curves")
```
